article_title: Blinken says fate of ceasefire plan down to Hamas
sentence: "The  speed  and  scale  of  the  carnage  and  killing  in  Gaza  is  beyond  anything  in  my  years  as  secretary  general,"  he  said.

article_title: Blinken says fate of ceasefire plan down to Hamas
sentence: The  war  began  after  Hamas  attacked  Israel  on  7  October,  killing  about  1,200  people  and  taking  251  others  back  to  Gaza  as  hostages.

article_title: Blinken says fate of ceasefire plan down to Hamas
sentence: The  Hamas-run  health  ministry  in  Gaza  says  more  than  37,000  people  have  been  killed  in  the  Israeli  offensive  since  then.
